      </div>
      <!--/column -->
      <div class="col-md-12">
        <figure class="rounded"><img src="./assets/img/photos/ab2.jpg" srcset="./assets/img/photos/ab2@2x.jpg 2x" alt=""></figure>
      </div>
      <!--/column -->
    </div>
    <!--/.row -->
